response.overview: Los Angeles is synonymous with Hollywood glamour, but it’s also host to some of the best cycling terrain in the world; home to a bike culture that's brimming with passion, diversity, and flair.  Ex-professional cyclist, and proud LA local, Rahsaan Bahati takes us on a ride through his city. He meets up with former and current racers, Olympic legend; Nelson ‘The Cheetah’ Vails, land speed record breaker; John Howard, and crit racing prospect Dante Young. Rahsaan also visits legendary bike shop; Velo Pasadena, and rides the best routes the City of Angels has to offer.
response.title: Cycling Heartlands: L.A.

results.name: Cycling Heartlands: Los Angeles - Official Trailer
